name: Zero Safety Sprint 2
description:
Here on sprint 2 you will be able to see components of the game start to be added but not fully working (Inventory, building)

Movement - WASD + Space (Jump)

Current building (0 & 1) to switch between a platform object and solar panel

Mouse scroll wheel to rotate object + left mouse to place (Object will show green if place able and red if not)

Inventory + Crafting not fully set up but you are able to pick up mushrooms (Only one set up) for a max stack size of 5

Oxygen goes down when you are outside of the base and fills back up one inside

Health decreases with 0 oxygen

Don't worry sprint 3 will be way better!

FORM= https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSelC2_DSXehDu6DzMyX8LjkietTyamNLc1I3pdt...
